channel.title: Pizzagrenadier on Bibmod
channel.description: Recent content in Pizzagrenadier on Bibmod

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Pizzagrenadier > 6_8mm_Badass_Tyrant_s_War_Beaky_Stern_Guardians [dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/6-8mm-badass-tyrant-s-war-beaky-stern-guardians

Id objet : 6-8mm-badass-tyrant-s-war-beaky-stern-guardians

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic infanterie SMI Sm-qg

Collections pour tags :

  • epic infanterie SMI Sm-qg NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7

Ten classic Stern Guardian beakies for the Badass Tyrant's War. Ten unique poses with the original style armor and weapons, fully kitted out with drum mag bolters, heavy bolter, heavy flamer, melta gun, plasma gun, flamer, and a sergeant with power sword and pistol. They are wearing blinged out veteran armor plate.

These are a full rebuild and remix of the classic Galactic Crusaders models. Thanks to Moonjammy, DangitBobby and JimmyZimms for the base models, and Daffmakes for the builder and assets.

This is a passion project, so please let me know if there are any issues with the files or if you have other ideas for units or weapons to go with this expanding addition to the Galactic Crusaders family.

These are meant to be used for the post Heresy era setting, and in particular, the Bad Ass Tyrant's War campaign. As such the weapon era, look, and loadouts all reflect that. These could easily be used for Heresy though.

This is a passion project, so please let me know if there are any issues with the files or if you have other ideas for units or weapons to go with this expanding addition to the Galactic Crusaders family.

These are meant to be used for the post Heresy era setting, and in particular, the Bad Ass Tyrant's War campaign. As such the weapon era, look, and loadouts all reflect that. These could easily be used for Heresy though.

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9

Complete HQ of beakies for the Badass Tyrant's War. Many unique poses with the original style armor and weapons, fully kitted out with all the gear for each of the specialists in the HQ.

Includes a Captain and Special Character, two Company Champions, two apothecary guys, a set of Banner Bearers, a Chaplain, a set of Librarians with various weapons, and a set of Tech Bros. Combine them or use them as individual models for scenic bases or whatever you want.

These are a full rebuild and remix of the classic Galactic Crusaders models. Thanks to Moonjammy, DangitBobby and JimmyZimms for the base models, and Daffmakes for the builder and assets.

This is a passion project, so please let me know if there are any issues with the files or if you have other ideas for units or weapons to go with this expanding addition to the Galactic Crusaders family.

These are meant to be used for the post Heresy era setting, and in particular, the Bad Ass Tyrant's War campaign. As such the weapon era, look, and loadouts all reflect that. These could easily be used for Heresy though.

6-8mm crates and barrels to go with the warehouses or on your epic scale bases, or as objective markers. Includes a simple oil/chemical barrel design, a small crate, and a large crate as well as stacks of each.

8mm miniature shown for scale purposes and is not included.

Six light Missile Launchers for beakies for the Badass Tyrant's War. Six unique poses of the later style tube missile launcher with the original style armor, fully kitted out with ammo backpack and a pistol holster. One for each of your tactical squads in your battle companies.

These are a full rebuild and remix of the classic Galactic Crusaders models. Thanks to Moonjammy, DangitBobby and JimmyZimms for the base models, and Daffmakes for the builder and assets.

This is a passion project, so please let me know if there are any issues with the files or if you have other ideas for units or weapons to go with this expanding addition to the Galactic Crusaders family.

These are meant to be used for the post Heresy era setting, and in particular, the Bad Ass Tyrant's War campaign. As such the weapon era, look, and loadouts all reflect that. These could easily be used for Heresy though.

Update: One guy was missing the ammo rack for his backpack, so I gave it to him. Sorry little buddy! Now he doesn't have to bum missiles off his brothers. 

"Brother, could I uhh... trouble you for uhhh... "

"You can't have any more of my missiles, Terrence. Go bother another brother. You shouldn't have left your backpack in the Thunderhawk..."
